channel.title: Meet our team on Carmentae Infrastructure Management

item.title: Dr. Clemens Kielhauser
item.description: advanced numerical modeling, uncertainty quantification and reliability assessment of engineering systems. He is currently co-managing director of Eracons and senior researcher/lecturer at TU M端nchen. J端rgen studied civil engineering and infrastructure management and received his PhD from ETH Z端rich in 2019. His areas of expertise include computational modelling, uncertainty quantification as well as risk and resilience assessment of infrastructure systems. He is co-founder of Carmentae and Assistant Professor for Complex Infrastructure Systems at the University of Liverpool.
